polished_text: These changes will significantly enhance the evaluation section with a new summary card, better color categorization, and improved visual hierarchy. The summary card provides a quick overview of the key metrics, while the color-coded sections make it easier to navigate the different types of evaluation data. The animations and tooltips add an extra layer of interactivity and engagement.
